abstract: The deal highlights the growing business of internal investigations into possible wrongdoing at corporations and other institutions, an increasingly lucrative area for law firms.
snippet: The deal highlights the growing business of internal investigations into possible wrongdoing at corporations and other institutions, an increasingly lucrative area for law firms.
lead_paragraph: Pepper Hamilton, the corporate law firm, has acquired the investigative group and legal practice run by Louis J. Freeh, the former director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

headline.main: Pepper Hamilton to Acquire Louis Freeh’s Firms
headline.print_headline: Pepper Hamilton to Acquire Louis Freeh’s Firms

abstract: Technological advances raised American living standards through most of the 20th century, but those days may be over, according to a new paper.
snippet: Technological advances raised American living standards through most of the 20th century, but those days may be over, according to a new paper.
lead_paragraph: They don’t call it the dismal science for nothing.
